258260.「……すごく きれい！\n スケッチのしがいが あるわ。:
It's so beautiful! I'm so excited about
sketching.

258262.「ユシュカ！ それに アンルシアさんも。\n ふたりとも いったい どうしたの？:
Yushka! And Anlucia. What's going on with you
two?

258263.「俺も アストルティアに咲く 桜って花を\n 見てみたくてな。……また アスバル:
I also wanted to see the cherry blossoms
blooming in Astoltia. I'm sure Asbal will be
saying that I'm out of the loop again.

258264.「カミハルムイの桜は ステキよね。\n 私たちも ご一緒して いいかしら？:
The cherry blossoms in Kamiharmui are
beautiful. Do you mind if we join you?

258266.「……すごい！\n イルーシャさんって 絵を描くのが\n とっても 上手なのね。: Wow! Irusha, you are very good at drawing.

258268.「そうだ。\n アンルシアさんも 絵を描いてみない？:
Yes, I do. Would you like to try your hand at
painting, Anlucia?

258270.「じつは……子供のころ 兄にプレゼントした\n 犬の絵を 上手なオニオーンだねっ:
I was once complimented on my good Ornery
Onion drawing that I gave to my brother as a
present when I was a child.

258271.「創世の女神サマ……なんて\n 大層な存在だとは 思えないよな。:
I don't think the Goddess of Creation Sama...
is such a big deal, do you?

258272.「絵を描いたり 笑ったり……。\n ああやってると どこにでもいる\n 普通の女:
Drawing pictures, laughing... When I'm like
that, I'm like an ordinary woman anywhere.

258273.「……なあ。\n あいつは 本当に 女神ルティアナなのか？\n イルーシャは イ:
Hey... Is he really the Goddess Lutiana? Is
Irusha not Irusha?

258274.「俺たちは フィネトカに戻るよ。\n 神殺しの秘技の修行も\n そろそろ 最後の:
We're going back to Finetka. It's almost time
for the final push in the training of the
secret technique of the God Killer.

258275.「じゃあね イルーシャさん……\n じゃなくて イルーシャ！ <pc>も！:
Bye, Ms. Irusha... no, Irusha! <And I'm not
just saying that.

258276.「うん！\n アンルシアたちも がんばって！: Yeah! Good luck to Anlucia and the others!

258277.「とても いい絵が描けたし アンルシアとも\n おしゃべりができて 楽しかったわ:
I had a great time painting and chatting with
Anlucia. Thanks for bringing me!

258278.「あと もう１か所だけ 付き合ってくれる？\n 最後に 海が描きたいの。\n 魔:
Can you hang out with me just one more spot? I
want to paint the ocean. The blue sea that
doesn't exist in Demon World.

258279.「キラキラ海岸の 東の小島は\n 人が少なくて 静かだから 絵を描くのに\n ち:
He said the Islet to the east of Kira Kira
Beach is quiet and uncrowded, so it seems like
a good place to paint.

258280.「……え？\n キラキラ海岸なんて 知らない……って？:
What? I don't know anything about a sparkling
beach?

258281.「アスバルがそう言っていたと 思うんだけど……\n 聞き間違いだったのかも。キラ:
I think that's what Asbal said...but maybe I
misheard him. I wonder if you know of a place
with a name similar to Sparkling Beach?

258282.「……できた！\n アストルティアの この青い海を 絵に描けたら\n とっても:
I'm done! I thought it would be so cool if I
could paint this blue sea of Astoltia!

258283.「これで 行きたかった場所には すべて\n 行けたわ。いろんなところへ\n 連れ:
Now I've been to all the places I wanted to
go. Thank you for taking me to all these
places.

258284.「……あっ！ <pc> ごめんなさい。\n やっぱり もう少しだけ 待ってもらっ:
...oh! <pc> I'm sorry. I'm sorry, but
can you wait just a little bit longer? I'd
like to take a dip in the ocean.

258285.「……砂浜は 歩きにくくて\n 波は 気持ちいいのね。\n 知らなかったわ……。:
...the beach is hard to walk on, but the waves
feel good. I didn't know...

258291.「海の水って しょっぱいのね。ふふっ。\n まだまだ 知らないことばかり…………:
Sea water is very salty, isn't it? Hmmm.
There's still so much I don't know...

258293.「本当は……消えてしまうなんて怖い。\n もっと いろんなことを 知りたい。\n:
The truth is...I'm afraid of disappearing. I
want to know more things. I don't want to
leave everyone.

258294.「<pc>と……\n ずっと 一緒にいたい……！: I want to be with <pc> forever...!

258296.「この美しい世界も そこに住む人たちも\n 大好きよ。みんなを救えるなら 私は\:
I love this beautiful world and the people who
live in it. I would gladly give my body to the
River of Light if I could save them all.

258297.「付き合ってくれて ありがとう。\n そろそろ フィネトカに戻りましょう。:
Thanks for hanging out with me. It's time to
get back to Finetka.

258298.「スケッチに 色を塗って\n 絵を 完成させなくちゃね。:
I have to color my sketches and complete my
paintings.

259200.「女神の祠を巡ったからか……感じるの。\n アストルティアは 創生のチカラに満ち:
Maybe it's because I've been to the shrine of
the goddess...I can feel it. Astoltia is full
of the power of creation.
